attributes.action: Stop any plans to introduce a UK “BRIT ID” card scheme
attributes.additional_details: ID cards risk creating mass surveillance and tracking of citizens, undermine personal freedoms, and add costs to taxpayers. Effective alternatives already exist for security and identification.
attributes.background: We call on the Government to abandon proposals for a UK “BRIT ID” card scheme. The UK has previously rejected ID cards, and there is no clear evidence of public demand or benefit.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Do not introduce Digital ID cards" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
